name: NeroVision Express Project File
summary: Learn about .NVC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NeroVision Express is included with versions 6 and later of Nero disc authoring software.

description: Video project saved by NeroVision Express (NVE) video-editing software; may also be a slideshow created by NeroVision Express that can be exported as video file; can be burned to a DVD when completed.
